articles.title: International Olympic Solidarity Workshop held
articles.content:
International Olympic Solidarity Workshop held 
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- An International Olympic Solidarity Workshop for Athletic Coaches was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium from October 23 to 26.
 It was attended by coaches of various sports groups and schools in Pyongyang and local areas and officials in the field of sports science and education.   
 David Sunderland, lecturer from the Association of the International Athletic Federation, gave a lecture on the physiological and biochemical change of long and medium distance runners and theoretical and practical problems arising in working out plans for lecture and training of athletes and their methods.

Stop to Japan's moves to revive militarism urged
articles.content:
Stop to Japan's moves to revive militarism urged
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The Pusan regional students' committee for the promotion of the joint national functions for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration reportedly issued a statement on Oct. 15 denouncing Japan for recently working hard to convert it into a military power and revive militarism.
 After the terrorist attacks in the United States, Japan spread a rumor about "threat from the north" and claimed that "South Korea-U.S.-Japan cooperation system should be intensified", revealing its intention to dampen the desire for exchange, cooperation and unity between the north and the south with moves to escalate the tensions, the statement said, and went on:    
 Japan should clearly know the cause of angry shouts "We oppose Japan, departed soul of militarism" ringing out from the people from all walks of life in South Korea, sincerely apologize for the past history of aggression and stop its moves to turn it into a military power and revive militarism.

articles.title: New ambassador to Egypt appointed
articles.content:
New ambassador to Egypt appointed
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Jon Hui Jong was appointed as DPRK ambassador e.p. to Egypt, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Greetings to Gambian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Gambian President
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Oct. 25 sent a message of greetings to Yaya. A. J. J. Jammeh upon his reelection as Gambian President.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the new century, too, it wished him great success in his responsible work for national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Czech Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Czech Republic
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, yesterday sent a message of greetings to Vaclav Havel, President of the Czech Republic, on the occasion of the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the independent state of Czechoslovakia, its national day.
 In the belief that the cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop on good terms in the future, too, the message sincerely wished the president and the people of the Czech Republic greater success in the work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: EU delegation here
articles.content:
EU delegation here
    Pyongyang, October 27 (KCNA) -- The EU delegation led by Patrick Van Haute, director of the department for Asian Affairs of the Foreign Ministry of Belgium which chairs the EU, arrived here today to discuss the issue of the development of the relations between the DPRK and the EU.
